Windlord/Nighlight::

"I... will be fine..." said weakly Nightlight "It just my shoulder... 
I just feel... pain, it ..."

Windlord saw worry Obfucios "Well whoever you're, if you're mechanic 
try to find out how the ship's systems back up... and we will be 
thankful..."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: I forgot most of my characters recently so I'll have to figure 
out where 
> they are.  (Expletive) midterms.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Please hurry Windlord.  I'm not sure how long she'll last 
without the 
> CR."  He then realizes how rude he's being to the two new 
bots.  "I'm sorry.  
> It's just that I should have been here.  Do either of you know 
enough about 
> electronics to get the ship's systems back up?"
> 
> 
> ::Obfucious::
>     He steps out of the shadows where he had been standing during 
the battle. 
>  "I used to be a mechanic until I found my calling."  He begins 
staring into 
> space reminiscing about when he found his calling.
